text: Natalya Torshina-Alimzhanova (born 4 October 1968 in Russian SFSR) is a Kazakhstani athlete who specializes in the 400 metres hurdles. Her personal best time is 54.50 seconds, achieved in May 2000 in Vila Real de Santo António. She competed at three Olympic Games. ==Competition record== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |rowspan=2|1993 |Asian Championships |Manila, Philippines |bgcolor="gold" | 1st |400 m hurdles |56.70 |-
